title: Url Structure - Scores Redirects
custom_preconds: GIVEN when user types the url beta-gcp.mlb.com/scores
custom_steps: WHEN user sends request to the url
custom_expected: THEN the page redirects to https://beta-gcp.mlb.com/scores

title: Url Structure - Scoreboard Redirects
custom_preconds: GIVEN when user types the url beta-gcp.mlb.com/scoreboard
custom_steps: WHEN user sends request to the url
custom_expected: THEN the page redirects to https://beta-gcp.mlb.com/scores

title: Url Structure - Canonical Url
custom_preconds: GIVEN when user is on the scores page
custom_steps: WHEN user inspects the page
custom_expected: THEN the canonical url is https://beta-gcp.mlb.com/scores

title: Url Structure - Page Title
custom_preconds: GIVEN when user is on the scores page
custom_steps: WHEN user inspects the page
custom_expected: THEN the page title is "MLB Scores | Baseball Scores"

title: Url Structure - Page Description
custom_preconds: GIVEN when user is on the scores page
custom_steps: WHEN user inspects the page
custom_expected: THEN the page description is "The official source for scores, previews, recaps, boxscores, video highlights, and more from every Major League Baseball game."

title: Url Structure - Spanish Scores Redirects
custom_preconds: GIVEN when user types the url beta-gcp.mlb.com/es/scores
custom_steps: WHEN user sends request to the url
custom_expected: THEN the page redirects to https://beta-gcp.mlb.com/es/scores

title: Url Structure - Spanish Scoreboard Redirects
custom_preconds: GIVEN when user types the url beta-gcp.mlb.com/es/scoreboard
custom_steps: WHEN user sends request to the url
custom_expected: THEN the page redirects to https://beta-gcp.mlb.com/es/scores

title: Url Structure - Spanish Canonical Url
custom_preconds: GIVEN when user is on the spanish scores page
custom_steps: WHEN user inspects the page
custom_expected: THEN the canonical url is https://beta-gcp.mlb.com/es/scores

title: Url Structure - Spanish Page Title
custom_preconds: GIVEN when user is on the spanish scores page
custom_steps: WHEN user inspects the page
custom_expected: THEN the page title is "Resultados MLB | Resultados de Béisbol"

title: Url Structure - Spanish Page Description
custom_preconds: GIVEN when user is on the spanish scores page
custom_steps: WHEN user inspects the page
custom_expected: THEN the page description is "La fuente oficial de resultados, avances, resúmenes, numeritos, videos destacados, y más de cada partido de las Grandes Ligas de Béisbol."

title: Url Structure - Club Scores Redirects
custom_preconds: GIVEN when user types the url beta-gcp.mets.com/scores
custom_steps: WHEN user sends request to the url
custom_expected: THEN the page redirects to https://beta-gcp.mlb.com/mets/scores

title: Url Structure - Club Canonical Url
custom_preconds: GIVEN when user is on the Mets scores page
custom_steps: WHEN user inspects the page
custom_expected: THEN the canonical url is https://beta-gcp.mlb.com/mets/scores

title: Url Structure - Club Page Title
custom_preconds: GIVEN when user is on the Mets scores page
custom_steps: WHEN user inspects the page
custom_expected: THEN the page title is "Mets Scores | Scoreboard | New York Mets"

title: Url Structure - Club Page Description
custom_preconds: GIVEN when user is on the Mets scores page
custom_steps: WHEN user inspects the page
custom_expected: THEN the page description is "The official scoreboard of the New York Mets including Gameday, video, highlights and box score."

title: Url Structure - Spanish Club Scores Redirects
custom_preconds: GIVEN when user types the url beta-gcp.mets.com/es/scores
custom_steps: WHEN user sends request to the url
custom_expected: THEN the page redirects to https://beta-gcp.mlb.com/es/mets/scores

title: Url Structure - Spanish Club Canonical Url
custom_preconds: GIVEN when user is on the Spanish Mets scores page
custom_steps: WHEN user inspects the page
custom_expected: THEN the canonical url is https://beta-gcp.mlb.com/es/mets/scores

title: Url Structure - Spanish Club Page Title
custom_preconds: GIVEN when user is on the Spanish Mets scores page
custom_steps: WHEN user inspects the page
custom_expected: THEN the page title is "Mets Resultados | Los Mets de Nueva York"

title: Url Structure - Spanish Club Page Description
custom_preconds: GIVEN when user is on the Spanish Mets scores page
custom_steps: WHEN user inspects the page
custom_expected: THEN the page description is "El marcador oficial de Mets de Nueva York que incluye Gameday, videos, jugadas destacadas, y resultados."

title: Url Structure - Url Date
custom_preconds: GIVEN when user is on the scores page looking at a specific date (2019-05-11)
custom_steps: WHEN the user navigates to 2019-05-11
custom_expected: https://beta-gcp.mlb.com/scores/2019-05-11

title: Url Structure - Spanish Url Date
custom_preconds: GIVEN when user is on the spanish scores page looking at a specific date (2019-05-11)
custom_steps: WHEN the user navigates to 2019-05-11
custom_expected: https://beta-gcp.mlb.com/es/scores/2019-05-11

title: Url Structure - Url with Club and Date
custom_preconds: GIVEN when user is on the Mets scores page looking at a specific date (2019-05-11)
custom_steps: WHEN the user navigates to 2019-05-11
custom_expected: THEN the url is https://beta-gcp.mlb.com/mets/scores/2019-05-11

title: Url Structure - Spanish Url with Club and Date
custom_preconds: GIVEN when user is on the Spanish Mets scores page looking at a specific date (2019-05-11)
custom_steps: WHEN the user navigates to 2019-05-11
custom_expected: THEN the url is https://beta-gcp.mlb.com/es/mets/scores/2019-05-11

title: Game State - Preview Desktop
custom_preconds: GIVEN user is looking at a game that hasn't begun yet
custom_steps: WHEN the user looks at the Game Time
custom_expected: THEN the game time is in shortTimeZoneName Standard (i.e. 7:00 PM ET)

title: Game State - Preview Mobile Expanded
custom_preconds: GIVEN user is looking at a game that hasn't begun yet
custom_steps: WHEN the user looks at the Game Time
custom_expected: THEN the game time is in shortTimeZoneName Standard (i.e. 7:00 PM ET)

title: Game State - Preview Mobile Condensed
custom_preconds: GIVEN user is looking at a game that hasn't begun yet
custom_steps: WHEN the user looks at the Game Time
custom_expected: THEN the game time is in shortTimeZoneName Standard (i.e. 7:00 PM ET)

title: Game State - Live Desktop
custom_preconds: GIVEN user is looking at a live game (in progress/not finished)
custom_steps: WHEN the user looks at the game's info
custom_expected: THEN they will see it say LIVE and the Inning (i.e. WARM UP, TOP 8, BOT 4, END 6)

title: Game State - Live Mobile Expanded
custom_preconds: GIVEN user is looking at a live game (in progress/not finished)
custom_steps: WHEN the user looks at the game's info
custom_expected: THEN they will see it say the Inning (i.e. WARM UP, TOP 8, BOT 4, END 6)

title: Game State - Live Mobile Condensed
custom_preconds: GIVEN user is looking at a live game (in progress/not finished)
custom_steps: WHEN the user looks at the game's info
custom_expected: THEN they will see it say the Inning (i.e. WARM UP, TOP 8, BOT 4, END 6)

title: Game State - Final Desktop
custom_preconds: GIVEN user is looking at a game that has gone final
custom_steps: WHEN the user looks at the game's result
custom_expected: THEN they will see it say FINAL and if > or < 9 innings, show final inning (i.e. FINAL/15)

title: Game State - Final Mobile Expanded
custom_preconds: GIVEN user is looking at a game that has gone final
custom_steps: WHEN the user looks at the game's result
custom_expected: THEN they will see it say FINAL and if > or < 9 innings, show final inning (i.e. FINAL/15)

title: Game State - Final Mobile Condensed
custom_preconds: GIVEN user is looking at a game that has gone final
custom_steps: WHEN the user looks at the game's result
custom_expected: THEN they will see it say FINAL and if > or < 9 innings, show final inning (i.e. FINAL/15)

title: Game State - Due Up Mid Inning Desktop
custom_preconds: GIVEN the user is looking at a game in the middle of an inning on desktop.
custom_steps: WHEN they look at the matchup section.
custom_expected: THEN they will see the next three batters due up.

title: Game State - Due Up Mid Inning Mobile Expanded
custom_preconds: GIVEN the user is looking at a game in the middle of an inning on mobile expanded.
custom_steps: WHEN they look at the matchup section.
custom_expected: THEN they will see the next three batters due up.

title: Game State - Due Up End Inning Desktop
custom_preconds: GIVEN the user is looking at a game in the end of an inning on desktop.
custom_steps: WHEN they look at the matchup section.
custom_expected: THEN they will see the next three batters due up.

title: Game State - Due Up End Inning Mobile Expanded
custom_preconds: GIVEN the user is looking at a game in the end of an inning on mobile expanded.
custom_steps: WHEN they look at the matchup section.
custom_expected: THEN they will see the next three batters due up.

title: Game Type - Spring Training
custom_preconds: GIVEN user is looking at a game with game.gameType flag T
custom_steps: WHEN the user views the game description
custom_expected: THEN they should see it say Spring Training

title: Game Type - Exhibition
custom_preconds: GIVEN user is looking at a game with game.gameType flag E
custom_steps: WHEN the user views the game description
custom_expected: THEN they should see it say Exhibition or describing the game

title: Game Type - Playoffs
custom_preconds: GIVEN user is looking at a game with game.gameType flag P
custom_steps: WHEN the user views the game description
custom_expected: THEN they should see it say the specific playoff round (Wild Card, ALDS, NLDS, ALCS, NLCS, World Series)

title: Series Status - Postseason
custom_preconds: GIVEN user is looking at a postseason game with a flag F, D, L, W, or C
custom_steps: WHEN the user views the game description
custom_expected: THEN they should see the series status (ie: CHC leads NYY 2-0, CHC and NYY tied 2-2, CHC wins World Series 4-3)

title: Game Status - Postponed Original Game Date Rescheduled
custom_preconds: GIVEN user is looking at a postponed game
custom_steps: WHEN there is a rescheduled date announced
custom_expected: THEN the game state should be final, game state should be PPD, and a display message should say Postponed:  | Makeup on

title: Game Status - Postponed Original Game Date Not Rescheduled
custom_preconds: GIVEN user is looking at a postponed game
custom_steps: WHEN there is no rescheduled date announced
custom_expected: THEN the game state should be final, game state should be PPD, and a display message should say Postponed:

title: Game Status - Postponed Makeup Date
custom_preconds: GIVEN user is looking at a postponed game
custom_steps: WHEN it is the day of the makeup game
custom_expected: THEN the game state should be preview, game time should be shown, and a display message should say Makeup of  (Postponed)

title: Game Status - Cancelled Original Game Date
custom_preconds: GIVEN user is looking at a cancelled game
custom_steps: WHEN the user views the game description
custom_expected: THEN the game state should be final, game state label should be cancelled, and a display message should say Cancelled:

title: Game Status - Suspended Original Game Date Not Rescheduled
custom_preconds: GIVEN user is looking at an incomplete suspended game prior to resumption date announced
custom_steps: WHEN the user views the game description
custom_expected: THEN the game state should be suspended, status T or U, game state label Inning/SUSP, and display message Suspended:

title: Game Status - Suspended Original Game Date Rescheduled
custom_preconds: GIVEN user is looking at an incomplete suspended game after resumption date announced
custom_steps: WHEN the user views the game description
custom_expected: THEN the game state should be suspended, status T or U, game state label Inning/SUSP, and display message Suspended: . To be completed on

title: Game Status - Suspended Original Game Date Completed
custom_preconds: GIVEN user is looking at a completed suspended game from the original date
custom_steps: WHEN the user views the game description
custom_expected: THEN the game state should be completed, status O or F, game state label Inning/SUSP, and display message Suspended: . Completed on

title: Game Status - Suspended Resume Date Completed
custom_preconds: GIVEN user is looking at a completed suspended game from the resume date
custom_steps: WHEN the user views the game description
custom_expected: THEN the game state should be completed, status O or F, game state label Inning/SUSP, and display message Completion of game suspended on

title: Product Links - Preview (P) Desktop
custom_preconds: GIVEN user is looking at a game that hasn't started
custom_steps: WHEN the user views the product links
custom_expected: THEN the following links should be available; MLB.TV, Gameday/Preview, Tickets

title: Product Links - Preview (P) Mobile Expanded
custom_preconds: GIVEN user is looking at a game that hasn't started
custom_steps: WHEN the user views the product links
custom_expected: THEN the following links should be available; Gameday/Preview, Tickets

title: Product Links - Preview (P) Mobile Condensed
custom_preconds: GIVEN user is looking at a game that hasn't started
custom_steps: WHEN the user views the product links
custom_expected: THEN no links should be available

title: Product Links - Live (L) Desktop
custom_preconds: GIVEN user is looking at a live game
custom_steps: WHEN the user views the product links
custom_expected: THEN the following links should be available; MLB.TV, Gameday, Highlights, Tickets

title: Product Links - Live (L) Mobile Expanded
custom_preconds: GIVEN user is looking at a live game
custom_steps: WHEN the user views the product links
custom_expected: THEN the following links should be available; Gameday, Highlights, Tickets

title: Product Links - Live (L) Mobile Condensed
custom_preconds: GIVEN user is looking at a live game
custom_steps: WHEN the user views the product links
custom_expected: THEN no links should be available

title: Product Links - Final (F) Desktop
custom_preconds: GIVEN user is looking at a game that has finished
custom_steps: WHEN the user views the product links
custom_expected: THEN the following links should be available; MLB.TV, Wrap, Box, Highlights, Tickets

title: Product Links - Final (F) Mobile Expanded
custom_preconds: GIVEN user is looking at a game that has finished
custom_steps: WHEN the user views the product links
custom_expected: THEN the following links should be available; Wrap, Box, Highlights, Tickets

title: Product Links - Final (F) Mobile Condensed
custom_preconds: GIVEN user is looking at a game that has finished
custom_steps: WHEN the user views the product links
custom_expected: THEN no links should be available

title: Product Links - MLB.TV Link Structure
custom_preconds: GIVEN user is looking at a MLB.TV link
custom_steps: WHEN the user clicks the link
custom_expected: THEN the url should have the structure /tv/g{gamePk}

title: Product Links - Show Preview (abstractGameCode = P)
custom_preconds: GIVEN user is looking at a game that hasn't started and codedGameState != S
custom_steps: WHEN the user views the product links
custom_expected: THEN the Preview button should show and have a link containing the structure /gameday/preview

title: Product Links - Show Gameday (abstractGameCode = P)
custom_preconds: GIVEN user is looking at a game that hasn't started and codedGameState != S
custom_steps: WHEN the user views the product links
custom_expected: THEN the Gameday button should show and have a link containing the structure /gameday/

title: Product Links - Show Gameday (abstractGameCode = L)
custom_preconds: GIVEN user is looking at a live game and codedGameState != S
custom_steps: WHEN the user views the product links
custom_expected: THEN the Gameday button should show and have a link containing the structure /gameday/

title: Product Links - Show Wrap
custom_preconds: GIVEN user is looking at a game
custom_steps: WHEN hasWrapArticle === true
custom_expected: THEN the Wrap button should show and have a link containing the structure /gameday/final/wrap

title: Product Links - Show Box
custom_preconds: GIVEN user is looking at a game
custom_steps: WHEN abstractGameCode == F and statusCode doesn't start with D or C
custom_expected: THEN the Box button should show and have a link containing the structure /gameday/final/box

title: Product Links - Show Highlights Live
custom_preconds: GIVEN user is looking at a game
custom_steps: WHEN abstractGameCode == L
custom_expected: THEN the Highlights button should show and have the string "tbd"

title: Product Links - Show Highlights Final
custom_preconds: GIVEN user is looking at a game
custom_steps: WHEN abstractGameCode == F
custom_expected: THEN the Highlights button should show and have a link containing the structure /gameday/final/video

title: Perfect Game/No Hitter - No Hitter Only
custom_preconds: GIVEN user is looking at a game
custom_steps:
WHEN flags.awayTeamNoHitter === true
OR flags.homeTeamNoHitter === true
custom_expected: THEN text saying No Hitter should be displayed for the proper team

title: Perfect Game/No Hitter - Perfect Game and No Hitter
custom_preconds: GIVEN user is looking at a game
custom_steps:
WHEN flags.awayTeamPerfectGame === true and flags.awayTeamNoHitter === true
OR flags.homeTeamPerfectGame === true and flags.homeTeamNoHitter === true
custom_expected: THEN text saying Perfect Game should be displayed for the proper team

title: Free Game of the Day - Label Displayed
custom_preconds: GIVEN user is looking at a game
custom_steps: WHEN the game is the Free Game of the Day (hydrate: content(media), datapoint: game.content.media.freeGame)
custom_expected: THEN the game should have the proper associated label

title: MLB Game of the Week Live on YouTube - Button
custom_preconds: GIVEN user is looking at a game
custom_steps: WHEN youtube.fgow===true and the game is not archived
custom_expected: THEN a YouTube icon will appear instead of the Watch Live button

title: MLB Game of the Week Live on YouTube - Links
custom_preconds: GIVEN user is looking at a game
custom_steps: WHEN youtube.fgow===true and the game is not archived
custom_expected: THEN the links should be statsapiGame.youtubeMLBLink || 'https://www.mlb.com/live-stream-games/youtube'

title: MLB Game of the Week Live on YouTube - Broadcaster
custom_preconds: GIVEN user is looking at a game
custom_steps: WHEN youtube.fgow===true and the game is not archived
custom_expected: THEN YouTube should be shown as the broadcaster

title: MLB Game of the Week Live on YouTube - Label
custom_preconds: GIVEN user is looking at a game
custom_steps: WHEN youtube.fgow===true and the game is not archived
custom_expected: THEN the label should be "Live on YouTube - Watch Free"

title: MLB Game of the Week Live on YouTube - Media Archive Available
custom_preconds: GIVEN user is looking at a game
custom_steps: WHEN youtube.fgow===true and the game is archived
custom_expected: THEN the watch button should be Watch Archive, link to regular MLB.TV archive, and label "Live on YouTube - Watch Free" is present

title: Broadcast Information - TV Networks Displayed
custom_preconds: GIVEN user is looking at a game
custom_steps: WHEN endpoint: game.broadcasts has broadcasts for the game
custom_expected: THEN all TV networks for the broadcast are displayed (ie: National TV "AAA", Home TV "BBB", Away TV "CCC" -> AAA, BBB, CCC)

title: Split Squad Notation - "(SS)" appended to the team name
custom_preconds: GIVEN user is looking at a game
custom_steps: WHEN a team is playing with a split squad (datapoint: game.teams[away|home].splitSquad)
custom_expected: THEN "(SS)" is appended to the team name playing with the split squad for that day

title: Auto Refresh - Page Auto Refreshes
custom_preconds: GIVEN user is looking at the scores/schedule page
custom_steps: WHEN looking at live data
custom_expected: THEN the data should refresh every 15 seconds

title: Schedule Sort - MLB Scoreboard
custom_preconds: GIVEN user is looking at the MLB scores/schedule page
custom_steps: WHEN the user views the day's games
custom_expected: THEN the games are ordered by Live Games, Upcoming Games, and Completed Games (each category is sorted chronologically by start time)

title: Schedule Sort - Club Scoreboard
custom_preconds: GIVEN user is looking at a club (Mets) scores/schedule page
custom_steps: WHEN the user views the day's games
custom_expected: THEN the games are ordered by Live Games, Upcoming Games, and Completed Games (each category is sorted chronologically by start time), except the club team's games are at the top if they have any for that day

title: All-Star Game - All-Star Game Design *NOT READY*
custom_preconds: GIVEN user is looking at a game
custom_steps: WHEN the gameType is A
custom_expected: THEN the game card should display the text "All Star"

title: Scoreboard - Empty State
custom_preconds: GIVEN user is looking at the scores/schedule page
custom_steps: WHEN there are no games on the day the user is looking at
custom_expected: THEN display empty state when there are no games scheduled for a given day AND have a error message "There are no games scheduled for the date selected"

title: Scoreboard - Spanish Page Empty State
custom_preconds: GIVEN user is looking at the spanish scores/schedule page
custom_steps: WHEN there are no games on the day the user is looking at
custom_expected: THEN display empty state when there are no games scheduled for a given day AND have a error message "No hay juegos programados para la fecha seleccionada"

title: Scoreboard - Error Handling
custom_preconds: GIVEN user is trying to load content
custom_steps: WHEN there is an error that prevents content from loading
custom_expected: THEN display the message "Oops, something went wrong. Try reloading the page. If the problem persists, please Contact Us"

title: Scoreboard - Spanish Error Handling
custom_preconds: GIVEN user is trying to load content on the spanish page
custom_steps: WHEN there is an error that prevents content from loading
custom_expected: THEN display the message "Disculpa, algo salió mal. Intenta recargando la página. Si el problema persiste, por favor contáctenos"

title: Scoreboard - Club names link to club sites
custom_preconds: GIVEN user wants to link to a club page
custom_steps: WHEN a user clicks a team's name on the scoreboard page
custom_expected: THEN clicking the club name links to that club page

title: Scoreboard - Club names link to Spanish club sites
custom_preconds: GIVEN user wants to link to a Spanish club page
custom_steps: WHEN a user clicks a team's name on the Spanish scoreboard page
custom_expected: THEN clicking the club name links to that Spanish club page

title: Scoreboard - If Necessary Label Desktop
custom_preconds: GIVEN user is looking at a playoff game in desktop view
custom_steps: WHEN the playoff game might not necessarily have to be played
custom_expected: THEN the if necessary label should be displayed

title: Scoreboard - Spanish If Necessary Label Desktop
custom_preconds: GIVEN user is looking at a playoff game in desktop view
custom_steps: WHEN the playoff game might not necessarily have to be played
custom_expected: THEN the if necessary label should be displayed

title: Scoreboard - If Necessary Label Mobile Expanded
custom_preconds: GIVEN user is looking at a playoff game in mobile expanded view
custom_steps: WHEN the playoff game might not necessarily have to be played
custom_expected: THEN the if necessary label should be displayed

title: Scoreboard - Spanish If Necessary Label Mobile Expanded
custom_preconds: GIVEN user is looking at a playoff game in mobile expanded view
custom_steps: WHEN the playoff game might not necessarily have to be played
custom_expected: THEN the if necessary label should be displayed

title: Scoreboard - If Necessary Label Mobile Condensed
custom_preconds: GIVEN user is looking at a playoff game in mobile condensed view
custom_steps: WHEN the playoff game might not necessarily have to be played
custom_expected: THEN the if necessary label should be displayed

title: Scoreboard - Spanish If Necessary Label Mobile Condensed
custom_preconds: GIVEN user is looking at a playoff game in mobile condensed view
custom_steps: WHEN the playoff game might not necessarily have to be played
custom_expected: THEN the if necessary label should be displayed

title: Scores Page Loads
custom_preconds: Go to https://beta-gcp.mlb.com/scores/
custom_steps: Verify the page returns a 200 response.
custom_expected: The page returns a 200 response.

title: Personalization - Favorite Team Scoreboard Desktop
custom_preconds: GIVEN when user is on beta-gcp.mlb.com/scores for any date on desktop view
custom_steps: WHEN the user views any date that has a game with their favorite team playing
custom_expected: THEN the game containing their favorite team should be displayed first and there should be a star next to their favorite team name

title: Personalization - Favorite Team Scoreboard Mobile Expanded
custom_preconds: GIVEN when user is on beta-gcp.mlb.com/scores for any date on mobile expanded view
custom_steps: WHEN the user views any date that has a game with their favorite team playing
custom_expected: THEN the game containing their favorite team should be displayed first and there should be a star next to their favorite team name

title: Personalization - Favorite Team Scoreboard Mobile Condensed
custom_preconds: GIVEN when user is on beta-gcp.mlb.com/scores for any date on mobile condensed view
custom_steps: WHEN the user views any date that has a game with their favorite team playing
custom_expected: THEN the game containing their favorite team should be displayed first and there should be a star next to their favorite team name

title: Personalization - Spanish Favorite Team Scoreboard Desktop
custom_preconds: GIVEN when user is on beta-gcp.mlb.com/es/scores for any date on desktop view
custom_steps: WHEN the user views any date that has a game with their favorite team playing
custom_expected: THEN the game containing their favorite team should be displayed first and there should be a star next to their favorite team name

title: Personalization - Spanish Favorite Team Scoreboard Mobile Expanded
custom_preconds: GIVEN when user is on beta-gcp.mlb.com/es/scores for any date on mobile expanded view
custom_steps: WHEN the user views any date that has a game with their favorite team playing
custom_expected: THEN the game containing their favorite team should be displayed first and there should be a star next to their favorite team name

custom_preconds: GIVEN when user is on beta-gcp.mlb.com/es/scores for any date on mobile condensed view
custom_steps: WHEN the user views any date that has a game with their favorite team playing
custom_expected: THEN the game containing their favorite team should be displayed first and there should be a star next to their favorite team name

title: Personalization - Club Favorite Team Scoreboard Desktop
custom_preconds: GIVEN when user is on beta-gcp.mlb.com/{club}/scores for any date on desktop view
custom_steps: WHEN the user views any date that has a game with their favorite team playing
custom_expected: THEN the game containing their favorite team should be displayed first if the club and favorite team are the same. Otherwise it should be displayed after the club team's game(s) and there should be a star next to their favorite team name

title: Personalization - Club Favorite Team Scoreboard Mobile Expanded
custom_preconds: GIVEN when user is on beta-gcp.mlb.com/{club}/scores for any date on mobile expanded view
custom_steps: WHEN the user views any date that has a game with their favorite team playing
custom_expected: THEN the game containing their favorite team should be displayed first if the club and favorite team are the same. Otherwise it should be displayed after the club team's game(s) and there should be a star next to their favorite team name

custom_steps: WHEN the user views any date that has a game with their favorite team playing
custom_expected: THEN the game containing their favorite team should be displayed first if the club and favorite team are the same. Otherwise it should be displayed after the club team's game(s) and there should be a star next to their favorite team name

custom_preconds: GIVEN when user is on beta-gcp.mlb.com/es/{club}/scores for any date on desktop view
custom_steps: WHEN the user views any date that has a game with their favorite team playing
custom_expected: THEN the game containing their favorite team should be displayed first if the club and favorite team are the same. Otherwise it should be displayed after the club team's game(s) and there should be a star next to their favorite team name

title: Personalization - Spanish Club Favorite Team Scoreboard Mobile Expanded
custom_preconds: GIVEN when user is on beta-gcp.mlb.com/es/{club}/scores for any date on mobile expanded view
custom_steps: WHEN the user views any date that has a game with their favorite team playing
custom_expected: THEN the game containing their favorite team should be displayed first if the club and favorite team are the same. Otherwise it should be displayed after the club team's game(s) and there should be a star next to their favorite team name

title: Personalization - Spanish Club Favorite Team Scoreboard Mobile Condensed
